title: We the Lord Lieutenant and Council considering the duty incumbent on us to give a right representation of His Majesties great care of, and indulgence to, his people, and to make the execution of the laws as easie and safe to his subjects, as the exegencie of the times and necessity of affairs may possibly admit ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Co.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer book-seller ...,
